body.name: FemiClear Restoratives Soothing Feminine Wash - Feminine Care Wash for Itching & Irritated Skin, Feminine Hygiene Products, Essentials for Vaginal Health, PH Balance for Women (6FL oz)
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 35 mins.
features: REFRESHING WASH: While the vagina cleans itself, the vulva does not, which is where FemiClear Feminine Wash comes into play! The vulva needs safe external cleansing to protect the vaginal environment. Our fragrance free feminine wash helps soothe using chamomilla and a unique prebiotic blend. Gynecologist tested, it cleanses gently while restoring pH balance.

SAFE AND SOOTHING: You deserve to feel clean! Let our wash be your go-to for safe and effective feminine hygiene with a pH-balancing formula that has no harmful ingredients like artificial fragrances, sulfates, parabens, dyes, carcinogens or dioxides.

ULTRA GENTLE: Made with quality ingredients, our feminine wash for women is safe and gentle to your vulva. The unique prebiotic blend gives comfort and helps maintain pH health. Formulated at an appropriate pH level, our intimate wash for women gently cleanses your vagina.

DIRECTIONS: Using clean hands, wet the area and pour our external vaginal wash into a hand or washcloth. Next, apply to the vulva in the shower or bath. Rinse well with water. Use once a day or as needed to soothe and balance the pH of your vulva. Can be used every time you wash or when something doesn’t feel right.

MAINTAINS BALANCE: When it comes to maintaining vaginal health, it's important to look for a cleanser with ingredients that help soothe itching, calm irritation, and help balance vaginal pH levels. When your vagina’s pH is out of balance, it can feel like everything else is out of balance as well. We understand how it feels to be out of sync with your center, so we worked with scientists and medical professionals to develop a high quality, gentle feminine wash made with natural ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps me feel clean & refreshed ✨
reviews.reviewText: Not medication, but works well.I feel clean and calm. I just started using this so I can’t tell if the probiotics are doing their thing. TBD.I also sort of like the weird medicinal scent. It kind of smells like an intense olive oil mixed with an intense tea tree oil and unknown herbs and spices. Honestly, I imagine some guy in a dark Amazon forest mixing this together in a bowl and chanting away the end of all yeast infections before bottling it in a bright pink and orange plastic bottle.Using something scented down there worries me a bit. My moto’s more like “Prada on the wrist. Organic in the slit.” ✨On a more serious note, I do wish the bottle was a little less glaringly bright so I could leave it in my shower. I’d rather not call direct attention to my personal business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This may be expensive but it's natural remedy works!!.. I have tried vagisil and summer's eve. This is the only product that stopped the dryness and itching within 2 days. It may not work quickly for some ppl or not at all. The size of the tube is misleading for how much is in it; but a little goes (pea size) long way. So the amt in the tube will last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I thought I was the only one noticing
reviews.reviewText: The bottle comes half empty…. The product is good I just feel like its not fear the bottle comes like that. Smells kind of neutral and rinsed off really good… I figured since it’s only half of bottle I received I’ll give half of the stars too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Solved the problem. Will order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can never use any feminine body soaps, they make me break out and actually causes me to get yeast infections. This is the first time that I have found something that actually works for me! You only need a tiny amount. I am very sensitive to lots of other soaps also. I’m so happy I finally found something natural I could use. Oh and this might be TMI but they have a natural product that gets rid of BV and that worked also. It has a strong smell and it burns when you use it but it said that was normal but let me tell you it worked! All symptoms went away and i finally feel normal down there again lol!!

reviews.reviewText: The "cleaning" product I received, when I opened the lid, there was no sealed aluminum paper inside. The bottle cap is filled with creamy things. This can of "cleaning" product had already been used before I received it. I request a return and a refund.
